gifts.name: Get 50% Off on KFC
gifts.desc: Get 50% off at any KFC store on shop for 999 and above.KFC, also known as Kentucky Fried Chicken, is an American fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain (as measured by sales) after McDonald's, with 22,621 locations globally in 136 countries as of December 2018. The chain is a subsidiary of Yum! Brands, a restaurant company that also owns the Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and WingStreet chains.KFC Hot Wings and fries.KFC was founded by Colonel Harland Sanders, an entrepreneur who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky, during the Great Depression. Sanders identified the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, and the first 'Kentucky Fried Chicken' franchise opened in Utah in 1952. KFC popularized chicken in the fast food industry, diversifying the market by challenging the established dominance of the hamburger. By branding himself as 'Colonel Sanders', Harland became a prominent figure of American cultural history, and his image remains widely used in KFC advertising to this day. However, the company's rapid expansion overwhelmed the aging Sanders, and he sold it to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown Jr. and Jack C. Massey in 1964.

gifts.name: Flat 40% Off on Zomato orders
gifts.desc: Flat 40% OFF on online transaction from select restaurants.Minimum order value of Rs 99 is required.Maximum savings of Rs 100.Zomato is an restaurant search and discovery service founded in 2008 by Deepinder Goyal and Pankaj Chaddah. It currently operates in 24 countries. It provides information and reviews of restaurants, including images of menus where the restaurant does not have its own website and also online delivery.The restaurant search and discovery platform began its operations under the name, Foodiebay. In November 2010, the brand was renamed as Zomato.By 2011, Zomato launched in Bengaluru, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, [[Ahmedabad] [Gandhidham]]. With the introduction of .xxx domains in 2011, Zomato also launched zomato.xxx, a site dedicated to food porn. The company launched a print version of the website content named, 'Citibank Zomato Restaurant Guide', in collaboration with Citibank in May 2012, but it has since been discontinued.

gifts.desc: The card is valid for 365 days from the date of its issuance, unless specified otherwise. Valid cards can be reloaded on tajhotels.com/giftcards, till a maximum card balance of ₹200,000. Cards would be automatically revalidated for 365 days from the date of load or reload. Revalidation requests would not be processed outside these terms. The cards can be redeemed at Taj, Vivanta or Gateway hotels in India for all valid spends at that hotel. This does not include Ginger Hotels. The card is valid for spends towards rooms, food and beverages, spa services and applicable taxes without restrictions, except for retail spends at third-party outlets at Taj hotels, business centre equipment hire, hired services from third party sources, or any expenses of a personal nature for which a pay-out is raised such as buying medicines, repairs of personal items, etc. Multiple transactions can be performed on the cards until the value of the card is exhausted. gifts.name: Thrillophilia E-Gift (Instant Voucher)
gifts.desc: Thrillophilia Gift Cards are issued by Thrillophilia Adventure Tours Pvt. Ltd. The Gift Cards cannot be transferred for value or redeemed for cash Thrillophilia cannot be held responsible in any manner whatsoever if a gift card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission. These gift cards cannot be clubbed with any other offer currently live on thrillophilia.com website/apps including cashback, discounts etc. on a particular credit/debit card. Any balance amount left on the used gift card can be reused within the validity period. In no event, the liability of Thrillophilia for any claims arising under this offer shall exceed 50% of the value of the gift card Thrillophilia is the final authority on the interpretation of these rules This is for individual use only, Travel agents found using the card would lead to cancellation of booking and no refund would be made. Disputes are subject to Jaipur jurisdiction In case of any cancellation of trips purchased using the gift cards within the validity period, the amount will be reversed to the card used at the time of booking. Steps to Redeem the card How to redeem: Login/Sign up and go to the wallet in profile page. Enter the gift card coupon which is received through an E-mail and click Redeem. Once card is redeemed, gifted amount will be credited in the wallet. This wallet amount can be used to book the tours and other activities on Thrillophilia website and apps E-Gift Cards are normally delivered instantly. But sometimes due to system issues, the delivery can be delayed up-to 24 - 48 hours. No returns and no refunds on gift cards, e-gift cards and gift vouchers shipped by woohoo.in. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

gifts.name: Camping, Rafting And Adventure Activities At Manali
gifts.desc: Himachal Pradesh, the land of Himalayan wonders, is a state in Northern India. One of the premier favorite destinations of the country, this state is famous for being home to something for everyone. Be it the beautiful sights of the towering Himalayas, the pristine beauty of the glaciers here, the green valleys with clear blue rivers and adventures of the highest levels, you will find it all here. One of the best things that the Himalayas and especially Himachal Pradesh is famous for its rafting. This tour takes you on a 2-day journey to the rivers in Manali for rafting and camping by the riverside experience. What is even better is that the camp also has some brilliant adventure activities that you can indulge in.

gifts.name: Igloo Stay Experience In Manali
gifts.desc: - The camp is settled at an off-beat location within the snow-capped regions. This whole zone is marked by white sheets and views of mountains all around. - One will be staying inside the snow-made homes, also called as Igloo, and feel the warmth of snow, not ironically but in real.

gifts.name: Dark Forest Tour In Munnar
gifts.desc: - Munnar is a land of beauty combined with some of the most inexplicable examples of mystery. On the list of these adventures is this trekking trail of the dark forest. - The place is named so because the canopy of trees is so thick that even in broad daylight, it remains pitch dark inside. This adds to the thrill of walking in the hills as you make your way through the forests. - Venturing onto some of the trickiest trekking routes of Munnar, and towards the end of the tour, the guide will also take you on tea plantation tour, adding an aromatic touch to the tour.

gifts.name: Tree House Stay At Seven Springs Plantation Resort, Munnar
gifts.desc: Just 15 minutes’ drive away from Munnar bus station, the Seven Springs Plantation Resort is a place surrounded cardamom plantation and forests on all sides. The resort is the perfect base camp for trekkers and peace seekers. Located atop a hill, the resort has a perfect view of Idukki Arch Dam (Asia’s biggest arch dam). Made of all wooden materials, the tree house of the resort is located 30 feet above ground, and comes decked with LED TV, Mini fridge, Coffee/tea maker, luxury mattresses, Intercom & attached luxury toilets. Covered with ethnic furnishings, the tree house also has wooden staircases, secured and checked for the safety of elderly and children.

gifts.name: Overnight Stay At K Gudi Wilderness Camp Near Mysore
gifts.desc: Visit this beautiful wilderness camps of Kyathadevara Gudi, located amidst the mesmerising scenery, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Reach the resort and check in at around 12:30 PM and start your day of relaxation. In the afternoon at around 01:30 PM have a sumptuous lunch. At around 03:30, sip a cup of tea or coffee and get ready for a jungle adventure in a jeep as you encounter gaur families, herds of elephants, bears, or a leopard perched on a tree. Witness the amazing wildlife show and learn about the laws of the jungle through others’ experiences at around 06:45 PM. In the evening at around 08:30 PM sit comfortably around the campfire and enjoy a delicious dinner. Next day, wake up early morning at around 06:00 AM and enjoy a cup of hot coffee. Again embark on the jungle safari at around 06:15 till 08:30 AM. Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast after your jeep safari and conclude your unforgettable trip to the nature camp at around 11:00 AM. The camp can accommodate thirty to forty guests at a time and it comprises 8 tented cottages, 3 log huts and 2 well-furnished family rooms at the Maharaja’s Hunting Lodge.

gifts.name: Trekking In Kudremukh In Karnataka
gifts.desc: Jeeps tread through the craggy terrains to reach the base camp, with the thrilling ride going through coffee estates and scenic waterfalls. Trekking 11 kilometers through the rainforests unravels nature's splendour, as multiple streams, views of towering peaks, and a 30-foot waterfall astound you before the Kudremukh peak is reached. More rugged Jeep rides are in store, with a walk till the Somavati stream leading to the serene confluence point of the Bhadra and Tungabhadra rivers. A visit to the coffee farms is another way to experience the transcendental beauty of the vicinity. And if luck is on your side, you might even be able to spot some of the wildlife species!

gifts.name: Sakleshpur 2 Day Adventure
gifts.desc: Sakleshpur is a hill station town and headquarters of Sakleshpur Taluk in Hassan district in the South Indian state of Karnataka. The town lies in the Malnad region on the magnificent hills of the biodiversity hotspot, the Western Ghats. It has an average elevation of 949 metres (3113 feet). Hemavathi river flows in Sakleshpur town. The southern range, which includes Bisle reserve forest and the region around Sakleshpur is listed as one of the 18 most diverse spots in the world in terms of flora and fauna.

gifts.name: Paragliding In Kullu Manali
gifts.desc: Experience an amazing paragliding ride in the skies of Manali and Kullu Valley on your next holiday with your family and friends. Experienced pilots will offer you both single and tandem rides for this experience and will take you on both short and long flights across the Kulu Valley. The short fly will be for 15 minutes and you will get to enjoy a birds-eye view of the beautiful hills and valleys of Kulu and Manali. The take-off site is at Dhobi, which is a new age, offbeat paragliding site and is now gaining popularity. It is located at about 20 kms from Kullu and you can reach here by either taking a public transport or by hiring a private cab The equipment you will need is imported from France and are tested for safety.

gifts.name: Camp Riverwild In Jim Corbett
gifts.desc: Camping in the wild boasts all the features of an exceptional jungle Retreat such as beautiful setting, excellent cuisine and abundant wildlife. It is located on the fringes of the Corbett Park and on the banks of the river Kosi- providing an exotic scenic view. Thatched roofs, wooden and stone finishes complete the picture of this getaway. Relax, read and soak in the warmth and vibrancy of camp is an ideal Jungle retreat for friends, families or small groups. Get your meals served on fine Indian pottery and you can make your own menu with the Executive Chef here. Adventurous wildlife safaris along with a guide make this place a truly memorable experience and highlight of your holiday.

gifts.name: Boutique Resort Stay In Nainital
gifts.desc: An impeccable union of the bygone era and contemporary style, the Resort near Nainital, is just the place to stay, celebrate and interact with your loved ones in nature's heart. This unique boutique resort is a mesmerizing destination boasting a plethora of inspiring spaces along with nature's opulence. Live the golden period while you experience bliss in the lush landscape of Uttarakhand.  It is gifted with numerous calm sit-outs where guests can spend amazing time with their dear ones.

gifts.name: Flat 25% -Arrow
gifts.desc: America's Iconic corporate wear brand. Brought to you exclusively in India by Arvind Lifestyle Brands. Now you can redeem your 'Arvind' Gift Card for exclusive ARROW Merchandise.Wearing an Arrow shirt with tie speaks of success and luxury. Arrow apparel is functional and yet fashion-forward, with an element of utter masculinity in every cut. Arm your loved one with an Arrow gift card and he’ll be all set to be part of one of the greatest American clothing traditions.

gifts.name: Helicopter Tour Of Da Nang City
gifts.desc: Explore Da Nang City in a 12-15 minutes helicopter ride The ride will take you around the most wonderful sites of this exotic beach destination. Tourists can enjoy the spectacular bird’s-eye view of the Marble Mountain also known as five element mountain which houses a number of caves You will also be able to view grottos, Buddhist temples and natural tunnels. Fly above Han river, Dragon bridge, Son Tra Peninsula and Da Nang beach which is considered the world's sixth most beautiful beach.

gifts.name: Scuba Diving In Malvan With Watertsports
gifts.desc: - You will be picked up from Calangute /Baga /Candolim beach, based on your preference at 7.00 in the morning. - From here, you will be driven to the Malvan beach in a bus post which there will be a speed motor boat ride towards the diving area in the beach. After reaching the diving spot, your day will become amazing with activities like scuba diving, parasailing, banana ride , Bumper ride, Speed boat ride with Parasailing. - Don't worry, you will be well trained before scuba diving and your briefing will be done properly so you don't lose your calm in deep waters. - Dive in the fun for a day and do not miss this trip which is worth to remember for in this life. -Witness some of the most beautiful corals and marine life with this Scuba Diving experience. -Dive into 25 to 30 feet underwater and get your pictures taken their to have some unforgettable memories. -Enjoy homely food after your scuba dive and head back home with an amazing experience.

gifts.name: Arvind Gift Card - Arrow
gifts.desc: America's Iconic corporate wear brand. Brought to you exclusively in India by Arvind Lifestyle Brands. Now you can redeem your 'Arvind' Gift Card for exclusive ARROW Merchandise.Wearing an Arrow shirt with tie speaks of success and luxury. Arrow apparel is functional and yet fashion-forward, with an element of utter masculinity in every cut. Arm your loved one with an Arrow gift card and he’ll be all set to be part of one of the greatest American clothing traditions.

gifts.name: Cycling At Divar And Chorao Islands
gifts.desc: Start your trip at Soccour Church around 7:00 AM in the morning and get ready for the day. After a quick briefing on how to use bicycle gears, safety instructions and a brief overview of the tour ahead, travel across Comburpha Ferry and head to the magnificient Chorao Island. Stop en route for breakfast at a local eatery and delight in the food chorao before you head on to the Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary and experience bird watching as you pedal through uninhabited areas in Chorao Island and ride back! We head to Divar Island, in case your body permits you to ride more. Drive through the picturesque village of Divar while enjoying the stunning sights. Tour ends back at Soccour Church, after a wonderful cycling expedition. Conclude your tour at around 12 PM and head back home with lots of memories.

gifts.name: Water Sports In Mobor, Goa
gifts.desc: Invoke in this exciting array of activities in Goa and get a chance to feel the thrill as you try these various activities. Arrive at the Mobor Beach in Goa to enjoy water sports and get started for the day. Get started with an invigorating Jet Ski ride and add more fun-frolic moments to your Goa trip. Post this, you can embark on Banana Boat Rides and Ringo Rides. After these two rides, it will be the time two float in the air with a session of Parasailing. Enjoy each of these activities for 15- 20 minutes and feel the thrill. This tour is a customized tour and can be availed in between 9:00 AM- 5:00 PM.

gifts.name: Jumbo Activity Package Goa
gifts.desc: Goa trip is a ritual, which you have to do before you die. All the time you listen to all your friends who had visited Goa and did this and that. Its your turn now. Planning a Goa trip easy. Goa has a lot of things to offer, the beaches, clubs, casinos, forts and not to forget the booze. But the most exiting thing about goa is certainly the watersports. But don’t worry about it, we’ve got your back. This package offers you almost all the watersport activities possible in Goa. No need to find a vendor, no need to negotiate, no need to feel unsafe, just enjoy the rides with us.

gifts.name: Ocean Trek To Neuti Beach, Goa
gifts.desc: Enthrall in this delightful Ocean Trek which is actually a walk along a mountain overlooking the sea. Begin this excursion from Porvorim in Goa at 07:00 AM, and drive to Kochra-Shriramwadi, a seaside hamlet between Vengurla and Malwan. After a breakfast, set off along a hilly path on the cliffs next to the sea – delight in the beauty of a remote beach while trekking alongside on the green mountain ranges. The Ocean Trek ends at the pristine Neuti Beach, post this the entire day is at leisure. You may take a spectacular plunge into the waters from a 20-ft-high rock, or go up and see the historic Neuti Fort. Continue your return journey to Goa at around 03:30 PM, reaching Porvorim by 07:30 PM and head back home.

gifts.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight In Assolda Ground, Goa
gifts.desc: If you are done with exploring the coastal beauty of Goa, then, embark on this amazing Hot Air Ballooning adventure in South Goa. Start this tour at around 6:30 AM in the morning after reaching the tour locality. Your flight begins with the inflation of the balloon by motorized fans. Once the envelope is filled with air, the propane burners are ignited and you are ready to fly within 30 minutes. Join your pilot in the hand-crafted basket, who will explore a variety of altitudes, up to 900 feet in the air for a marvelous overview of Goa. Throughout your flight, ground crew follows your balloon over grounds and roads so as to assure with a safe landing. Conclude this activity at 8:00 AM and head back home after clicking some memorable pictures.

gifts.name: 25% off On Gifts & More: Get Flat 25% OFF
gifts.desc: Avail flat 25% discount on the Gifting products The minimum order of Rs 999 is required to avail the discount benefits User can get Maximum of Rs 400 discount Apply the Floweraura coupon code directly on the

gifts.name: Kumara Parvatha Trek, Coorg
gifts.desc: Coorg, the paradisaical destination of the Western Ghats, is a beautiful place abound with many beauties of nature. One amongst them is Kumar Parvatha, which, at 1,712m, is the second highest peak in Coorg and the sixth in Karnataka. Located at the edge of Coorg and Dakshina Kannada, this towering peak is a part of the scenic Pushpagiri range of the Western Ghats and is nestled away amidst lush and verdant jungles. Find the route to Kumara Parvatha trek charming since it takes you across some of the most stunning escapes of nature bordered by flora and fauna on either side. However, if you are not an avid trekker then the Kumara Parvatha Trekking route might pose a few challenges along the way. However, rest assured that every effort you take will be rewarded by stunning landscapes from the mountains. Peppered with trails, both easy and difficult, the Kumara Parvatha Trek experience will tire you and delight you at the same time. The Kumara Parvatha Trekking package includes food, accommodation, guide, and transportation from and to Bangalore.

gifts.name: Mountain Camping And Trekking In Kodaikanal
gifts.desc: An assured beautiful package is here before you. It is nothing but a camping and trekking experience in Kodaikkanal, Tamil Nadu. This is a 2 day 1 night package with some exciting activities as deep forest camping, visiting the natural falls and water bodies. Partake in morning exercise sessions, listen to the nature talks by experts, indulge in bird watching, star gazing, enjoy the camp fire, get a dip in the water falls, enjoy the musical nights, adventure games, environmental talks and debates and share your real life adventure stories. The package includes food, accommodation in 2/3/4 sharing tents and transportation from Kodai lake to the activity point and return. The trip starts at around 10:00 AM from Kodaikanal Lake and ends at around 06:00 PM, the following day.

gifts.name: Nandi Hills Drive In Camp With Movie Screening, Bangalore
gifts.desc: The campsite is located right at the foot of the Nandi Hills. Surrounded by lush green hills and grounds. You can enjoy staying in the cozy and comfortable 2 people tent, pitched in the middle of an amazing grassland from where you can enjoy an unbeatable view of the Nandi Hills. An added advantage to the campsite is the uber cool and hip cafe. gifts.name: Get 50% Off on KFC
gifts.desc: Get 50% off at any KFC store on shop for 999 and above.KFC, also known as Kentucky Fried Chicken, is an American fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain (as measured by sales) after McDonald's, with 22,621 locations globally in 136 countries as of December 2018. The chain is a subsidiary of Yum! Brands, a restaurant company that also owns the Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and WingStreet chains.KFC Hot Wings and fries.KFC was founded by Colonel Harland Sanders, an entrepreneur who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky, during the Great Depression. Sanders identified the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, and the first 'Kentucky Fried Chicken' franchise opened in Utah in 1952. KFC popularized chicken in the fast food industry, diversifying the market by challenging the established dominance of the hamburger. By branding himself as 'Colonel Sanders', Harland became a prominent figure of American cultural history, and his image remains widely used in KFC advertising to this day. However, the company's rapid expansion overwhelmed the aging Sanders, and he sold it to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown Jr. and Jack C. Massey in 1964.

In November 2010, the brand was renamed as Zomato.By 2011, Zomato launched in Bengaluru, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, [[Ahmedabad] [Gandhidham]]. With the introduction of .xxx domains in 2011, Zomato also launched zomato.xxx, a site dedicated to food porn. gifts.desc: Just 15 minutes’ drive away from Munnar bus station, the Seven Springs Plantation Resort is a place surrounded cardamom plantation and forests on all sides. The resort is the perfect base camp for trekkers and peace seekers. Located atop a hill, the resort has a perfect view of Idukki Arch Dam (Asia’s biggest arch dam). Made of all wooden materials, the tree house of the resort is located 30 feet above ground, and comes decked with LED TV, Mini fridge, Coffee/tea maker, luxury mattresses, Intercom & attached luxury toilets. Covered with ethnic furnishings, the tree house also has wooden staircases, secured and checked for the safety of elderly and children.

gifts.name: Overnight Stay At K Gudi Wilderness Camp Near Mysore
gifts.desc: Visit this beautiful wilderness camps of Kyathadevara Gudi, located amidst the mesmerising scenery, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Reach the resort and check in at around 12:30 PM and start your day of relaxation. In the afternoon at around 01:30 PM have a sumptuous lunch. At around 03:30, sip a cup of tea or coffee and get ready for a jungle adventure in a jeep as you encounter gaur families, herds of elephants, bears, or a leopard perched on a tree. Witness the amazing wildlife show and learn about the laws of the jungle through others’ experiences at around 06:45 PM. In the evening at around 08:30 PM sit comfortably around the campfire and enjoy a delicious dinner. Next day, wake up early morning at around 06:00 AM and enjoy a cup of hot coffee. Again embark on the jungle safari at around 06:15 till 08:30 AM. Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast after your jeep safari and conclude your unforgettable trip to the nature camp at around 11:00 AM. The camp can accommodate thirty to forty guests at a time and it comprises 8 tented cottages, 3 log huts and 2 well-furnished family rooms at the Maharaja’s Hunting Lodge.

gifts.name: Trekking In Kudremukh In Karnataka
gifts.desc: Jeeps tread through the craggy terrains to reach the base camp, with the thrilling ride going through coffee estates and scenic waterfalls. Trekking 11 kilometers through the rainforests unravels nature's splendour, as multiple streams, views of towering peaks, and a 30-foot waterfall astound you before the Kudremukh peak is reached. More rugged Jeep rides are in store, with a walk till the Somavati stream leading to the serene confluence point of the Bhadra and Tungabhadra rivers. A visit to the coffee farms is another way to experience the transcendental beauty of the vicinity. And if luck is on your side, you might even be able to spot some of the wildlife species!

gifts.name: Sakleshpur 2 Day Adventure
gifts.desc: Sakleshpur is a hill station town and headquarters of Sakleshpur Taluk in Hassan district in the South Indian state of Karnataka. The town lies in the Malnad region on the magnificent hills of the biodiversity hotspot, the Western Ghats. It has an average elevation of 949 metres (3113 feet). Hemavathi river flows in Sakleshpur town. The southern range, which includes Bisle reserve forest and the region around Sakleshpur is listed as one of the 18 most diverse spots in the world in terms of flora and fauna.

gifts.name: Paragliding In Kullu Manali
gifts.desc: Experience an amazing paragliding ride in the skies of Manali and Kullu Valley on your next holiday with your family and friends. Experienced pilots will offer you both single and tandem rides for this experience and will take you on both short and long flights across the Kulu Valley. The short fly will be for 15 minutes and you will get to enjoy a birds-eye view of the beautiful hills and valleys of Kulu and Manali. The take-off site is at Dhobi, which is a new age, offbeat paragliding site and is now gaining popularity. It is located at about 20 kms from Kullu and you can reach here by either taking a public transport or by hiring a private cab The equipment you will need is imported from France and are tested for safety.

gifts.name: Camp Riverwild In Jim Corbett
gifts.desc: Camping in the wild boasts all the features of an exceptional jungle Retreat such as beautiful setting, excellent cuisine and abundant wildlife. It is located on the fringes of the Corbett Park and on the banks of the river Kosi- providing an exotic scenic view. Thatched roofs, wooden and stone finishes complete the picture of this getaway. Relax, read and soak in the warmth and vibrancy of camp is an ideal Jungle retreat for friends, families or small groups. Get your meals served on fine Indian pottery and you can make your own menu with the Executive Chef here. Adventurous wildlife safaris along with a guide make this place a truly memorable experience and highlight of your holiday.

gifts.name: Boutique Resort Stay In Nainital
gifts.desc: An impeccable union of the bygone era and contemporary style, the Resort near Nainital, is just the place to stay, celebrate and interact with your loved ones in nature's heart. This unique boutique resort is a mesmerizing destination boasting a plethora of inspiring spaces along with nature's opulence. Live the golden period while you experience bliss in the lush landscape of Uttarakhand.  It is gifted with numerous calm sit-outs where guests can spend amazing time with their dear ones.

gifts.name: Helicopter Tour Of Da Nang City
gifts.desc: Explore Da Nang City in a 12-15 minutes helicopter ride The ride will take you around the most wonderful sites of this exotic beach destination. Tourists can enjoy the spectacular bird’s-eye view of the Marble Mountain also known as five element mountain which houses a number of caves You will also be able to view grottos, Buddhist temples and natural tunnels. Fly above Han river, Dragon bridge, Son Tra Peninsula and Da Nang beach which is considered the world's sixth most beautiful beach.

gifts.name: Scuba Diving In Malvan With Watertsports
gifts.desc: - You will be picked up from Calangute /Baga /Candolim beach, based on your preference at 7.00 in the morning. - From here, you will be driven to the Malvan beach in a bus post which there will be a speed motor boat ride towards the diving area in the beach. After reaching the diving spot, your day will become amazing with activities like scuba diving, parasailing, banana ride , Bumper ride, Speed boat ride with Parasailing. - Don't worry, you will be well trained before scuba diving and your briefing will be done properly so you don't lose your calm in deep waters. - Dive in the fun for a day and do not miss this trip which is worth to remember for in this life. -Witness some of the most beautiful corals and marine life with this Scuba Diving experience. -Dive into 25 to 30 feet underwater and get your pictures taken their to have some unforgettable memories. -Enjoy homely food after your scuba dive and head back home with an amazing experience.

gifts.name: Cycling At Divar And Chorao Islands
gifts.desc: Start your trip at Soccour Church around 7:00 AM in the morning and get ready for the day. After a quick briefing on how to use bicycle gears, safety instructions and a brief overview of the tour ahead, travel across Comburpha Ferry and head to the magnificient Chorao Island. Stop en route for breakfast at a local eatery and delight in the food chorao before you head on to the Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary and experience bird watching as you pedal through uninhabited areas in Chorao Island and ride back! We head to Divar Island, in case your body permits you to ride more. Drive through the picturesque village of Divar while enjoying the stunning sights. Tour ends back at Soccour Church, after a wonderful cycling expedition. Conclude your tour at around 12 PM and head back home with lots of memories.

gifts.desc: Invoke in this exciting array of activities in Goa and get a chance to feel the thrill as you try these various activities. Arrive at the Mobor Beach in Goa to enjoy water sports and get started for the day. Get started with an invigorating Jet Ski ride and add more fun-frolic moments to your Goa trip. Post this, you can embark on Banana Boat Rides and Ringo Rides. After these two rides, it will be the time two float in the air with a session of Parasailing. Enjoy each of these activities for 15- 20 minutes and feel the thrill. This tour is a customized tour and can be availed in between 9:00 AM- 5:00 PM.

gifts.name: Jumbo Activity Package Goa
gifts.desc: Goa trip is a ritual, which you have to do before you die. All the time you listen to all your friends who had visited Goa and did this and that. Its your turn now. Planning a Goa trip easy. Goa has a lot of things to offer, the beaches, clubs, casinos, forts and not to forget the booze. But the most exiting thing about goa is certainly the watersports. But don’t worry about it, we’ve got your back. This package offers you almost all the watersport activities possible in Goa. No need to find a vendor, no need to negotiate, no need to feel unsafe, just enjoy the rides with us.

gifts.name: Ocean Trek To Neuti Beach, Goa
gifts.desc: Enthrall in this delightful Ocean Trek which is actually a walk along a mountain overlooking the sea. Begin this excursion from Porvorim in Goa at 07:00 AM, and drive to Kochra-Shriramwadi, a seaside hamlet between Vengurla and Malwan. After a breakfast, set off along a hilly path on the cliffs next to the sea – delight in the beauty of a remote beach while trekking alongside on the green mountain ranges. The Ocean Trek ends at the pristine Neuti Beach, post this the entire day is at leisure. You may take a spectacular plunge into the waters from a 20-ft-high rock, or go up and see the historic Neuti Fort. Continue your return journey to Goa at around 03:30 PM, reaching Porvorim by 07:30 PM and head back home.

gifts.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight In Assolda Ground, Goa
gifts.desc: If you are done with exploring the coastal beauty of Goa, then, embark on this amazing Hot Air Ballooning adventure in South Goa. Start this tour at around 6:30 AM in the morning after reaching the tour locality. Your flight begins with the inflation of the balloon by motorized fans. Once the envelope is filled with air, the propane burners are ignited and you are ready to fly within 30 minutes. Join your pilot in the hand-crafted basket, who will explore a variety of altitudes, up to 900 feet in the air for a marvelous overview of Goa. Throughout your flight, ground crew follows your balloon over grounds and roads so as to assure with a safe landing. Conclude this activity at 8:00 AM and head back home after clicking some memorable pictures.

gifts.name: Kumara Parvatha Trek, Coorg
gifts.desc: Coorg, the paradisaical destination of the Western Ghats, is a beautiful place abound with many beauties of nature. One amongst them is Kumar Parvatha, which, at 1,712m, is the second highest peak in Coorg and the sixth in Karnataka. Located at the edge of Coorg and Dakshina Kannada, this towering peak is a part of the scenic Pushpagiri range of the Western Ghats and is nestled away amidst lush and verdant jungles. Find the route to Kumara Parvatha trek charming since it takes you across some of the most stunning escapes of nature bordered by flora and fauna on either side. However, if you are not an avid trekker then the Kumara Parvatha Trekking route might pose a few challenges along the way. However, rest assured that every effort you take will be rewarded by stunning landscapes from the mountains. Peppered with trails, both easy and difficult, the Kumara Parvatha Trek experience will tire you and delight you at the same time. The Kumara Parvatha Trekking package includes food, accommodation, guide, and transportation from and to Bangalore.

gifts.name: Mountain Camping And Trekking In Kodaikanal
gifts.desc: An assured beautiful package is here before you. It is nothing but a camping and trekking experience in Kodaikkanal, Tamil Nadu. This is a 2 day 1 night package with some exciting activities as deep forest camping, visiting the natural falls and water bodies. Partake in morning exercise sessions, listen to the nature talks by experts, indulge in bird watching, star gazing, enjoy the camp fire, get a dip in the water falls, enjoy the musical nights, adventure games, environmental talks and debates and share your real life adventure stories. The package includes food, accommodation in 2/3/4 sharing tents and transportation from Kodai lake to the activity point and return. The trip starts at around 10:00 AM from Kodaikanal Lake and ends at around 06:00 PM, the following day.

gifts.name: Nandi Hills Drive In Camp With Movie Screening, Bangalore
gifts.desc: The campsite is located right at the foot of the Nandi Hills. Surrounded by lush green hills and grounds. You can enjoy staying in the cozy and comfortable 2 people tent, pitched in the middle of an amazing grassland from where you can enjoy an unbeatable view of the Nandi Hills. An added advantage to the campsite is the uber cool and hip cafe. The place offers tasty food like Pizza, Pasta and many more cuisines, a snooker table in the middle and a really lavish ambiance with facilities for shisha available as well. However, the best feature of this campsite is live Screening of cricket matches/ movie screening in the night with barbecue snacks that can be availed at special request. Other than that, the camp also offers an amazing Sunrise Trek, Rain dance with an add-on sightseeing of Nandi Hills that can be done through your own vehicle.

gifts.desc: Set in the quiet boundless expanses outside of Bangalore, Ankit Vista Green Village is one of the premium resorts near to the silicon capital of India, Bangalore. Spread over a sprawling field, this resort has a broad mixed bag of expansive view with has all that much a dynamic blend of greenery. It is very well designed resort in Bangalore and has a rich green scene and brags of outstandingly tasteful building outline.The ethereal including makes a retreat circumstance that expands the visitor's rebuilding over weekends by lightening their mind, body and soul. An empowering escape close Bangalore, a day out at Ankit Vista Green Village makes a perfect outing destination for both corporate teams and family trips over weekends offering a  quiet respite amidst diversion and outside exercises nearby lavish settlement. Embark on a day out at Ankita Vista Green Village and let nature welcome you with its charms!

gifts.name: Coorg Coffee Plantation Tour
gifts.desc: Coorg coffee plantation tour provides you an opportunity to witness complete journey of coffee- right from the seed till the packed powder ready to adorn your mugs. Experience staying in these lush-green coffee estates, where even the air seems to carry the coffee aroma. Indulge in gaining an in-depth knowledge of coffee cultivation with this amazing coffee plantation tour in Madenadu Village in Coorg. The tour will start around 10:00 AM and it extends up to 3 hours. Interact with the locals who are well versed in all techniques used in coffee plantation. Learn more about pruning techniques, picking, drying and other important information. Take a walk through these sprawling coffee estates, learn about other popular plantations of the region as well such as pepper, cardamom, wild fruits during your Coorg coffee plantation tour. Well, there is no better way to end this amazing Coorg coffee plantation tour than drinking coffee in the back yard of coffee estates.

gifts.name: Tadiandamol Trek 2019, Coorg
gifts.desc: The scenic Western Ghats offer exciting adventures for thrill seekers who want to explore the wild side. About 274 km from Bangalore, the Tadiandamol Peak is the highest peak in Coorg and is surrounded by stunning greenery of the Shola forests. Reaching an elevation of 1,748m, Tadiandamol trekking in Coorg is a perfect trek for both domestic and international travellers. A 2-day getaway is ideal for nature loving families, couples, backpackers and corporate guests. The 15 km trek to Tadiandamol is nothing short of exciting activity. Enjoy unravelling the winsome and landscape of Coorg that lures several travellers. Once on top, feel the pride as you conquer the highest peak of the destination. This feat is rewarded with sweeping views of green forests and coffee plantations. The Tadiandamol Trek package includes food, accommodation in tents or dormitory and transportation from Bangalore to Bangalore, and guides.

gifts.name: Get 50% Off on KFC
gifts.desc: Get 50% off at any KFC store on shop for 999 and above.KFC, also known as Kentucky Fried Chicken, is an American fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain (as measured by sales) after McDonald's, with 22,621 locations globally in 136 countries as of December 2018. The chain is a subsidiary of Yum! Brands, a restaurant company that also owns the Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and WingStreet chains.KFC Hot Wings and fries.KFC was founded by Colonel Harland Sanders, an entrepreneur who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky, during the Great Depression. Sanders identified the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, and the first 'Kentucky Fried Chicken' franchise opened in Utah in 1952. KFC popularized chicken in the fast food industry, diversifying the market by challenging the established dominance of the hamburger. By branding himself as 'Colonel Sanders', Harland became a prominent figure of American cultural history, and his image remains widely used in KFC advertising to this day. However, the company's rapid expansion overwhelmed the aging Sanders, and he sold it to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown Jr. and Jack C. Massey in 1964.

gifts.desc: Thrillophilia Gift Cards are issued by Thrillophilia Adventure Tours Pvt. Ltd. The Gift Cards cannot be transferred for value or redeemed for cash Thrillophilia cannot be held responsible in any manner whatsoever if a gift card is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without permission. These gift cards cannot be clubbed with any other offer currently live on thrillophilia.com website/apps including cashback, discounts etc. on a particular credit/debit card. Please check the refund policy at http://www.woohoo.in/faq for further details.

gifts.name: Camping, Rafting And Adventure Activities At Manali
gifts.desc: Himachal Pradesh, the land of Himalayan wonders, is a state in Northern India. One of the premier favorite destinations of the country, this state is famous for being home to something for everyone. Be it the beautiful sights of the towering Himalayas, the pristine beauty of the glaciers here, the green valleys with clear blue rivers and adventures of the highest levels, you will find it all here. One of the best things that the Himalayas and especially Himachal Pradesh is famous for its rafting. This tour takes you on a 2-day journey to the rivers in Manali for rafting and camping by the riverside experience. What is even better is that the camp also has some brilliant adventure activities that you can indulge in.

gifts.name: Igloo Stay Experience In Manali
gifts.desc: - The camp is settled at an off-beat location within the snow-capped regions. This whole zone is marked by white sheets and views of mountains all around. - One will be staying inside the snow-made homes, also called as Igloo, and feel the warmth of snow, not ironically but in real.

gifts.name: Dark Forest Tour In Munnar
gifts.desc: - Munnar is a land of beauty combined with some of the most inexplicable examples of mystery. On the list of these adventures is this trekking trail of the dark forest. - The place is named so because the canopy of trees is so thick that even in broad daylight, it remains pitch dark inside. This adds to the thrill of walking in the hills as you make your way through the forests. - Venturing onto some of the trickiest trekking routes of Munnar, and towards the end of the tour, the guide will also take you on tea plantation tour, adding an aromatic touch to the tour.

gifts.name: Tree House Stay At Seven Springs Plantation Resort, Munnar
gifts.desc: Just 15 minutes’ drive away from Munnar bus station, the Seven Springs Plantation Resort is a place surrounded cardamom plantation and forests on all sides. The resort is the perfect base camp for trekkers and peace seekers. Located atop a hill, the resort has a perfect view of Idukki Arch Dam (Asia’s biggest arch dam). Made of all wooden materials, the tree house of the resort is located 30 feet above ground, and comes decked with LED TV, Mini fridge, Coffee/tea maker, luxury mattresses, Intercom & attached luxury toilets. Covered with ethnic furnishings, the tree house also has wooden staircases, secured and checked for the safety of elderly and children.

gifts.name: Overnight Stay At K Gudi Wilderness Camp Near Mysore
gifts.desc: Visit this beautiful wilderness camps of Kyathadevara Gudi, located amidst the mesmerising scenery, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Reach the resort and check in at around 12:30 PM and start your day of relaxation. In the afternoon at around 01:30 PM have a sumptuous lunch. At around 03:30, sip a cup of tea or coffee and get ready for a jungle adventure in a jeep as you encounter gaur families, herds of elephants, bears, or a leopard perched on a tree. Witness the amazing wildlife show and learn about the laws of the jungle through others’ experiences at around 06:45 PM. In the evening at around 08:30 PM sit comfortably around the campfire and enjoy a delicious dinner. Next day, wake up early morning at around 06:00 AM and enjoy a cup of hot coffee. Again embark on the jungle safari at around 06:15 till 08:30 AM. Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast after your jeep safari and conclude your unforgettable trip to the nature camp at around 11:00 AM. The camp can accommodate thirty to forty guests at a time and it comprises 8 tented cottages, 3 log huts and 2 well-furnished family rooms at the Maharaja’s Hunting Lodge.

gifts.name: Trekking In Kudremukh In Karnataka
gifts.desc: Jeeps tread through the craggy terrains to reach the base camp, with the thrilling ride going through coffee estates and scenic waterfalls. Trekking 11 kilometers through the rainforests unravels nature's splendour, as multiple streams, views of towering peaks, and a 30-foot waterfall astound you before the Kudremukh peak is reached. More rugged Jeep rides are in store, with a walk till the Somavati stream leading to the serene confluence point of the Bhadra and Tungabhadra rivers. A visit to the coffee farms is another way to experience the transcendental beauty of the vicinity. And if luck is on your side, you might even be able to spot some of the wildlife species!

gifts.name: Sakleshpur 2 Day Adventure
gifts.desc: Sakleshpur is a hill station town and headquarters of Sakleshpur Taluk in Hassan district in the South Indian state of Karnataka. The town lies in the Malnad region on the magnificent hills of the biodiversity hotspot, the Western Ghats. It has an average elevation of 949 metres (3113 feet). Hemavathi river flows in Sakleshpur town. The southern range, which includes Bisle reserve forest and the region around Sakleshpur is listed as one of the 18 most diverse spots in the world in terms of flora and fauna.

gifts.name: Paragliding In Kullu Manali
gifts.desc: Experience an amazing paragliding ride in the skies of Manali and Kullu Valley on your next holiday with your family and friends. Experienced pilots will offer you both single and tandem rides for this experience and will take you on both short and long flights across the Kulu Valley. The short fly will be for 15 minutes and you will get to enjoy a birds-eye view of the beautiful hills and valleys of Kulu and Manali. The take-off site is at Dhobi, which is a new age, offbeat paragliding site and is now gaining popularity. It is located at about 20 kms from Kullu and you can reach here by either taking a public transport or by hiring a private cab The equipment you will need is imported from France and are tested for safety.

gifts.name: Camp Riverwild In Jim Corbett
gifts.desc: Camping in the wild boasts all the features of an exceptional jungle Retreat such as beautiful setting, excellent cuisine and abundant wildlife. It is located on the fringes of the Corbett Park and on the banks of the river Kosi- providing an exotic scenic view. Thatched roofs, wooden and stone finishes complete the picture of this getaway. Relax, read and soak in the warmth and vibrancy of camp is an ideal Jungle retreat for friends, families or small groups. Get your meals served on fine Indian pottery and you can make your own menu with the Executive Chef here. Adventurous wildlife safaris along with a guide make this place a truly memorable experience and highlight of your holiday.

gifts.name: Boutique Resort Stay In Nainital
gifts.desc: An impeccable union of the bygone era and contemporary style, the Resort near Nainital, is just the place to stay, celebrate and interact with your loved ones in nature's heart. This unique boutique resort is a mesmerizing destination boasting a plethora of inspiring spaces along with nature's opulence. Live the golden period while you experience bliss in the lush landscape of Uttarakhand.  It is gifted with numerous calm sit-outs where guests can spend amazing time with their dear ones.

gifts.name: Flat 25% -Arrow
gifts.desc: America's Iconic corporate wear brand. Brought to you exclusively in India by Arvind Lifestyle Brands. Now you can redeem your 'Arvind' Gift Card for exclusive ARROW Merchandise.Wearing an Arrow shirt with tie speaks of success and luxury. Arrow apparel is functional and yet fashion-forward, with an element of utter masculinity in every cut. Arm your loved one with an Arrow gift card and he’ll be all set to be part of one of the greatest American clothing traditions.

gifts.name: Helicopter Tour Of Da Nang City
gifts.desc: Explore Da Nang City in a 12-15 minutes helicopter ride The ride will take you around the most wonderful sites of this exotic beach destination. Tourists can enjoy the spectacular bird’s-eye view of the Marble Mountain also known as five element mountain which houses a number of caves You will also be able to view grottos, Buddhist temples and natural tunnels. Fly above Han river, Dragon bridge, Son Tra Peninsula and Da Nang beach which is considered the world's sixth most beautiful beach.

gifts.name: Scuba Diving In Malvan With Watertsports
gifts.desc: - You will be picked up from Calangute /Baga /Candolim beach, based on your preference at 7.00 in the morning. - From here, you will be driven to the Malvan beach in a bus post which there will be a speed motor boat ride towards the diving area in the beach. After reaching the diving spot, your day will become amazing with activities like scuba diving, parasailing, banana ride , Bumper ride, Speed boat ride with Parasailing. - Don't worry, you will be well trained before scuba diving and your briefing will be done properly so you don't lose your calm in deep waters. - Dive in the fun for a day and do not miss this trip which is worth to remember for in this life. -Witness some of the most beautiful corals and marine life with this Scuba Diving experience. -Dive into 25 to 30 feet underwater and get your pictures taken their to have some unforgettable memories. -Enjoy homely food after your scuba dive and head back home with an amazing experience.

gifts.name: Arvind Gift Card - Arrow
gifts.desc: America's Iconic corporate wear brand. Brought to you exclusively in India by Arvind Lifestyle Brands. Now you can redeem your 'Arvind' Gift Card for exclusive ARROW Merchandise.Wearing an Arrow shirt with tie speaks of success and luxury. Arrow apparel is functional and yet fashion-forward, with an element of utter masculinity in every cut. Arm your loved one with an Arrow gift card and he’ll be all set to be part of one of the greatest American clothing traditions.

gifts.name: Cycling At Divar And Chorao Islands
gifts.desc: Start your trip at Soccour Church around 7:00 AM in the morning and get ready for the day. After a quick briefing on how to use bicycle gears, safety instructions and a brief overview of the tour ahead, travel across Comburpha Ferry and head to the magnificient Chorao Island. Stop en route for breakfast at a local eatery and delight in the food chorao before you head on to the Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary and experience bird watching as you pedal through uninhabited areas in Chorao Island and ride back! We head to Divar Island, in case your body permits you to ride more. Drive through the picturesque village of Divar while enjoying the stunning sights. Tour ends back at Soccour Church, after a wonderful cycling expedition. Conclude your tour at around 12 PM and head back home with lots of memories.

gifts.name: Water Sports In Mobor, Goa
gifts.desc: Invoke in this exciting array of activities in Goa and get a chance to feel the thrill as you try these various activities. Arrive at the Mobor Beach in Goa to enjoy water sports and get started for the day. Get started with an invigorating Jet Ski ride and add more fun-frolic moments to your Goa trip. Post this, you can embark on Banana Boat Rides and Ringo Rides. After these two rides, it will be the time two float in the air with a session of Parasailing. Enjoy each of these activities for 15- 20 minutes and feel the thrill. This tour is a customized tour and can be availed in between 9:00 AM- 5:00 PM.

gifts.name: 15% off Special Designer Cakes
gifts.desc: Indian Gifts Portal is offering Flat 15% OFF on delicious cakes available on the portal. gifts.name: Jumbo Activity Package Goa
gifts.desc: Goa trip is a ritual, which you have to do before you die. All the time you listen to all your friends who had visited Goa and did this and that. Its your turn now. Planning a Goa trip easy. Goa has a lot of things to offer, the beaches, clubs, casinos, forts and not to forget the booze. But the most exiting thing about goa is certainly the watersports. But don’t worry about it, we’ve got your back. This package offers you almost all the watersport activities possible in Goa. No need to find a vendor, no need to negotiate, no need to feel unsafe, just enjoy the rides with us.

gifts.name: Ocean Trek To Neuti Beach, Goa
gifts.desc: Enthrall in this delightful Ocean Trek which is actually a walk along a mountain overlooking the sea. Begin this excursion from Porvorim in Goa at 07:00 AM, and drive to Kochra-Shriramwadi, a seaside hamlet between Vengurla and Malwan. After a breakfast, set off along a hilly path on the cliffs next to the sea – delight in the beauty of a remote beach while trekking alongside on the green mountain ranges. The Ocean Trek ends at the pristine Neuti Beach, post this the entire day is at leisure. You may take a spectacular plunge into the waters from a 20-ft-high rock, or go up and see the historic Neuti Fort. Continue your return journey to Goa at around 03:30 PM, reaching Porvorim by 07:30 PM and head back home.

gifts.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight In Assolda Ground, Goa
gifts.desc: If you are done with exploring the coastal beauty of Goa, then, embark on this amazing Hot Air Ballooning adventure in South Goa. Start this tour at around 6:30 AM in the morning after reaching the tour locality. Your flight begins with the inflation of the balloon by motorized fans. Once the envelope is filled with air, the propane burners are ignited and you are ready to fly within 30 minutes. Join your pilot in the hand-crafted basket, who will explore a variety of altitudes, up to 900 feet in the air for a marvelous overview of Goa. Throughout your flight, ground crew follows your balloon over grounds and roads so as to assure with a safe landing. Conclude this activity at 8:00 AM and head back home after clicking some memorable pictures.

gifts.name: 25% off On Gifts & More: Get Flat 25% OFF
gifts.desc: Avail flat 25% discount on the Gifting products The minimum order of Rs 999 is required to avail the discount benefits User can get Maximum of Rs 400 discount Apply the Floweraura coupon code directly on the

gifts.name: Kumara Parvatha Trek, Coorg
gifts.desc: Coorg, the paradisaical destination of the Western Ghats, is a beautiful place abound with many beauties of nature. One amongst them is Kumar Parvatha, which, at 1,712m, is the second highest peak in Coorg and the sixth in Karnataka. Located at the edge of Coorg and Dakshina Kannada, this towering peak is a part of the scenic Pushpagiri range of the Western Ghats and is nestled away amidst lush and verdant jungles. Find the route to Kumara Parvatha trek charming since it takes you across some of the most stunning escapes of nature bordered by flora and fauna on either side. However, if you are not an avid trekker then the Kumara Parvatha Trekking route might pose a few challenges along the way. However, rest assured that every effort you take will be rewarded by stunning landscapes from the mountains. Peppered with trails, both easy and difficult, the Kumara Parvatha Trek experience will tire you and delight you at the same time. The Kumara Parvatha Trekking package includes food, accommodation, guide, and transportation from and to Bangalore.

gifts.name: Mountain Camping And Trekking In Kodaikanal
gifts.desc: An assured beautiful package is here before you. It is nothing but a camping and trekking experience in Kodaikkanal, Tamil Nadu. This is a 2 day 1 night package with some exciting activities as deep forest camping, visiting the natural falls and water bodies. Partake in morning exercise sessions, listen to the nature talks by experts, indulge in bird watching, star gazing, enjoy the camp fire, get a dip in the water falls, enjoy the musical nights, adventure games, environmental talks and debates and share your real life adventure stories. The package includes food, accommodation in 2/3/4 sharing tents and transportation from Kodai lake to the activity point and return. The trip starts at around 10:00 AM from Kodaikanal Lake and ends at around 06:00 PM, the following day.

gifts.name: Nandi Hills Drive In Camp With Movie Screening, Bangalore
gifts.desc: The campsite is located right at the foot of the Nandi Hills. Surrounded by lush green hills and grounds. You can enjoy staying in the cozy and comfortable 2 people tent, pitched in the middle of an amazing grassland from where you can enjoy an unbeatable view of the Nandi Hills. An added advantage to the campsite is the uber cool and hip cafe. The place offers tasty food like Pizza, Pasta and many more cuisines, a snooker table in the middle and a really lavish ambiance with facilities for shisha available as well. However, the best feature of this campsite is live Screening of cricket matches/ movie screening in the night with barbecue snacks that can be availed at special request. Other than that, the camp also offers an amazing Sunrise Trek, Rain dance with an add-on sightseeing of Nandi Hills that can be done through your own vehicle.

gifts.name: Get 50% Off on KFC
gifts.desc: Get 50% off at any KFC store on shop for 999 and above.KFC, also known as Kentucky Fried Chicken, is an American fast food restaurant chain headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky that specializes in fried chicken. It is the world's second-largest restaurant chain (as measured by sales) after McDonald's, with 22,621 locations globally in 136 countries as of December 2018. The chain is a subsidiary of Yum! Brands, a restaurant company that also owns the Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, and WingStreet chains.KFC Hot Wings and fries.KFC was founded by Colonel Harland Sanders, an entrepreneur who began selling fried chicken from his roadside restaurant in Corbin, Kentucky, during the Great Depression. Sanders identified the potential of the restaurant franchising concept, and the first 'Kentucky Fried Chicken' franchise opened in Utah in 1952. KFC popularized chicken in the fast food industry, diversifying the market by challenging the established dominance of the hamburger. By branding himself as 'Colonel Sanders', Harland became a prominent figure of American cultural history, and his image remains widely used in KFC advertising to this day. However, the company's rapid expansion overwhelmed the aging Sanders, and he sold it to a group of investors led by John Y. Brown Jr. and Jack C. Massey in 1964.

In November 2010, the brand was renamed as Zomato.By 2011, Zomato launched in Bengaluru, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, [[Ahmedabad] [Gandhidham]]. With the introduction of .xxx domains in 2011, Zomato also launched zomato.xxx, a site dedicated to food porn. gifts.name: Dark Forest Tour In Munnar
gifts.desc: - Munnar is a land of beauty combined with some of the most inexplicable examples of mystery. On the list of these adventures is this trekking trail of the dark forest. - The place is named so because the canopy of trees is so thick that even in broad daylight, it remains pitch dark inside. This adds to the thrill of walking in the hills as you make your way through the forests. - Venturing onto some of the trickiest trekking routes of Munnar, and towards the end of the tour, the guide will also take you on tea plantation tour, adding an aromatic touch to the tour.

gifts.name: Tree House Stay At Seven Springs Plantation Resort, Munnar
gifts.desc: Just 15 minutes’ drive away from Munnar bus station, the Seven Springs Plantation Resort is a place surrounded cardamom plantation and forests on all sides. The resort is the perfect base camp for trekkers and peace seekers. Located atop a hill, the resort has a perfect view of Idukki Arch Dam (Asia’s biggest arch dam). Made of all wooden materials, the tree house of the resort is located 30 feet above ground, and comes decked with LED TV, Mini fridge, Coffee/tea maker, luxury mattresses, Intercom & attached luxury toilets. Covered with ethnic furnishings, the tree house also has wooden staircases, secured and checked for the safety of elderly and children.

gifts.name: Overnight Stay At K Gudi Wilderness Camp Near Mysore
gifts.desc: Visit this beautiful wilderness camps of Kyathadevara Gudi, located amidst the mesmerising scenery, away from the hustle and bustle of city life. Reach the resort and check in at around 12:30 PM and start your day of relaxation. In the afternoon at around 01:30 PM have a sumptuous lunch. At around 03:30, sip a cup of tea or coffee and get ready for a jungle adventure in a jeep as you encounter gaur families, herds of elephants, bears, or a leopard perched on a tree. Witness the amazing wildlife show and learn about the laws of the jungle through others’ experiences at around 06:45 PM. In the evening at around 08:30 PM sit comfortably around the campfire and enjoy a delicious dinner. Next day, wake up early morning at around 06:00 AM and enjoy a cup of hot coffee. Again embark on the jungle safari at around 06:15 till 08:30 AM. Enjoy a sumptuous breakfast after your jeep safari and conclude your unforgettable trip to the nature camp at around 11:00 AM. The camp can accommodate thirty to forty guests at a time and it comprises 8 tented cottages, 3 log huts and 2 well-furnished family rooms at the Maharaja’s Hunting Lodge.

gifts.name: Trekking In Kudremukh In Karnataka
gifts.desc: Jeeps tread through the craggy terrains to reach the base camp, with the thrilling ride going through coffee estates and scenic waterfalls. Trekking 11 kilometers through the rainforests unravels nature's splendour, as multiple streams, views of towering peaks, and a 30-foot waterfall astound you before the Kudremukh peak is reached. More rugged Jeep rides are in store, with a walk till the Somavati stream leading to the serene confluence point of the Bhadra and Tungabhadra rivers. A visit to the coffee farms is another way to experience the transcendental beauty of the vicinity. And if luck is on your side, you might even be able to spot some of the wildlife species!

gifts.name: Sakleshpur 2 Day Adventure
gifts.desc: Sakleshpur is a hill station town and headquarters of Sakleshpur Taluk in Hassan district in the South Indian state of Karnataka. The town lies in the Malnad region on the magnificent hills of the biodiversity hotspot, the Western Ghats. It has an average elevation of 949 metres (3113 feet). Hemavathi river flows in Sakleshpur town. The southern range, which includes Bisle reserve forest and the region around Sakleshpur is listed as one of the 18 most diverse spots in the world in terms of flora and fauna.

gifts.name: Paragliding In Kullu Manali
gifts.desc: Experience an amazing paragliding ride in the skies of Manali and Kullu Valley on your next holiday with your family and friends. Experienced pilots will offer you both single and tandem rides for this experience and will take you on both short and long flights across the Kulu Valley. The short fly will be for 15 minutes and you will get to enjoy a birds-eye view of the beautiful hills and valleys of Kulu and Manali. The take-off site is at Dhobi, which is a new age, offbeat paragliding site and is now gaining popularity. It is located at about 20 kms from Kullu and you can reach here by either taking a public transport or by hiring a private cab The equipment you will need is imported from France and are tested for safety.

gifts.name: Camp Riverwild In Jim Corbett
gifts.desc: Camping in the wild boasts all the features of an exceptional jungle Retreat such as beautiful setting, excellent cuisine and abundant wildlife. It is located on the fringes of the Corbett Park and on the banks of the river Kosi- providing an exotic scenic view. Thatched roofs, wooden and stone finishes complete the picture of this getaway. Relax, read and soak in the warmth and vibrancy of camp is an ideal Jungle retreat for friends, families or small groups. Get your meals served on fine Indian pottery and you can make your own menu with the Executive Chef here. Adventurous wildlife safaris along with a guide make this place a truly memorable experience and highlight of your holiday.

gifts.name: Boutique Resort Stay In Nainital
gifts.desc: An impeccable union of the bygone era and contemporary style, the Resort near Nainital, is just the place to stay, celebrate and interact with your loved ones in nature's heart. This unique boutique resort is a mesmerizing destination boasting a plethora of inspiring spaces along with nature's opulence. Live the golden period while you experience bliss in the lush landscape of Uttarakhand.  It is gifted with numerous calm sit-outs where guests can spend amazing time with their dear ones.

gifts.name: Helicopter Tour Of Da Nang City
gifts.desc: Explore Da Nang City in a 12-15 minutes helicopter ride The ride will take you around the most wonderful sites of this exotic beach destination. Tourists can enjoy the spectacular bird’s-eye view of the Marble Mountain also known as five element mountain which houses a number of caves You will also be able to view grottos, Buddhist temples and natural tunnels. Fly above Han river, Dragon bridge, Son Tra Peninsula and Da Nang beach which is considered the world's sixth most beautiful beach.

gifts.name: Scuba Diving In Malvan With Watertsports
gifts.desc: - You will be picked up from Calangute /Baga /Candolim beach, based on your preference at 7.00 in the morning. - From here, you will be driven to the Malvan beach in a bus post which there will be a speed motor boat ride towards the diving area in the beach. After reaching the diving spot, your day will become amazing with activities like scuba diving, parasailing, banana ride , Bumper ride, Speed boat ride with Parasailing. - Don't worry, you will be well trained before scuba diving and your briefing will be done properly so you don't lose your calm in deep waters. - Dive in the fun for a day and do not miss this trip which is worth to remember for in this life. -Witness some of the most beautiful corals and marine life with this Scuba Diving experience. -Dive into 25 to 30 feet underwater and get your pictures taken their to have some unforgettable memories. -Enjoy homely food after your scuba dive and head back home with an amazing experience.

gifts.name: Cycling At Divar And Chorao Islands
gifts.desc: Start your trip at Soccour Church around 7:00 AM in the morning and get ready for the day. After a quick briefing on how to use bicycle gears, safety instructions and a brief overview of the tour ahead, travel across Comburpha Ferry and head to the magnificient Chorao Island. Stop en route for breakfast at a local eatery and delight in the food chorao before you head on to the Salim Ali Bird Sanctuary and experience bird watching as you pedal through uninhabited areas in Chorao Island and ride back! We head to Divar Island, in case your body permits you to ride more. Drive through the picturesque village of Divar while enjoying the stunning sights. Tour ends back at Soccour Church, after a wonderful cycling expedition. Conclude your tour at around 12 PM and head back home with lots of memories.

gifts.desc: Invoke in this exciting array of activities in Goa and get a chance to feel the thrill as you try these various activities. Arrive at the Mobor Beach in Goa to enjoy water sports and get started for the day. Get started with an invigorating Jet Ski ride and add more fun-frolic moments to your Goa trip. Post this, you can embark on Banana Boat Rides and Ringo Rides. After these two rides, it will be the time two float in the air with a session of Parasailing. Enjoy each of these activities for 15- 20 minutes and feel the thrill. This tour is a customized tour and can be availed in between 9:00 AM- 5:00 PM.

gifts.name: Jumbo Activity Package Goa
gifts.desc: Goa trip is a ritual, which you have to do before you die. All the time you listen to all your friends who had visited Goa and did this and that. Its your turn now. Planning a Goa trip easy. Goa has a lot of things to offer, the beaches, clubs, casinos, forts and not to forget the booze. But the most exiting thing about goa is certainly the watersports. But don’t worry about it, we’ve got your back. This package offers you almost all the watersport activities possible in Goa. No need to find a vendor, no need to negotiate, no need to feel unsafe, just enjoy the rides with us.

gifts.name: Ocean Trek To Neuti Beach, Goa
gifts.desc: Enthrall in this delightful Ocean Trek which is actually a walk along a mountain overlooking the sea. Begin this excursion from Porvorim in Goa at 07:00 AM, and drive to Kochra-Shriramwadi, a seaside hamlet between Vengurla and Malwan. After a breakfast, set off along a hilly path on the cliffs next to the sea – delight in the beauty of a remote beach while trekking alongside on the green mountain ranges. The Ocean Trek ends at the pristine Neuti Beach, post this the entire day is at leisure. You may take a spectacular plunge into the waters from a 20-ft-high rock, or go up and see the historic Neuti Fort. Continue your return journey to Goa at around 03:30 PM, reaching Porvorim by 07:30 PM and head back home.

gifts.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight In Assolda Ground, Goa
gifts.desc: If you are done with exploring the coastal beauty of Goa, then, embark on this amazing Hot Air Ballooning adventure in South Goa. Start this tour at around 6:30 AM in the morning after reaching the tour locality. Your flight begins with the inflation of the balloon by motorized fans. Once the envelope is filled with air, the propane burners are ignited and you are ready to fly within 30 minutes. Join your pilot in the hand-crafted basket, who will explore a variety of altitudes, up to 900 feet in the air for a marvelous overview of Goa. Throughout your flight, ground crew follows your balloon over grounds and roads so as to assure with a safe landing. Conclude this activity at 8:00 AM and head back home after clicking some memorable pictures.

gifts.name: Kumara Parvatha Trek, Coorg
gifts.desc: Coorg, the paradisaical destination of the Western Ghats, is a beautiful place abound with many beauties of nature. One amongst them is Kumar Parvatha, which, at 1,712m, is the second highest peak in Coorg and the sixth in Karnataka. Located at the edge of Coorg and Dakshina Kannada, this towering peak is a part of the scenic Pushpagiri range of the Western Ghats and is nestled away amidst lush and verdant jungles. Find the route to Kumara Parvatha trek charming since it takes you across some of the most stunning escapes of nature bordered by flora and fauna on either side. However, if you are not an avid trekker then the Kumara Parvatha Trekking route might pose a few challenges along the way. However, rest assured that every effort you take will be rewarded by stunning landscapes from the mountains. Peppered with trails, both easy and difficult, the Kumara Parvatha Trek experience will tire you and delight you at the same time. The Kumara Parvatha Trekking package includes food, accommodation, guide, and transportation from and to Bangalore.

gifts.name: Mountain Camping And Trekking In Kodaikanal
gifts.desc: An assured beautiful package is here before you. It is nothing but a camping and trekking experience in Kodaikkanal, Tamil Nadu. This is a 2 day 1 night package with some exciting activities as deep forest camping, visiting the natural falls and water bodies. Partake in morning exercise sessions, listen to the nature talks by experts, indulge in bird watching, star gazing, enjoy the camp fire, get a dip in the water falls, enjoy the musical nights, adventure games, environmental talks and debates and share your real life adventure stories. The package includes food, accommodation in 2/3/4 sharing tents and transportation from Kodai lake to the activity point and return. The trip starts at around 10:00 AM from Kodaikanal Lake and ends at around 06:00 PM, the following day.

gifts.name: Nandi Hills Drive In Camp With Movie Screening, Bangalore
gifts.desc: The campsite is located right at the foot of the Nandi Hills. Surrounded by lush green hills and grounds. You can enjoy staying in the cozy and comfortable 2 people tent, pitched in the middle of an amazing grassland from where you can enjoy an unbeatable view of the Nandi Hills. An added advantage to the campsite is the uber cool and hip cafe. The place offers tasty food like Pizza, Pasta and many more cuisines, a snooker table in the middle and a really lavish ambiance with facilities for shisha available as well. However, the best feature of this campsite is live Screening of cricket matches/ movie screening in the night with barbecue snacks that can be availed at special request. Other than that, the camp also offers an amazing Sunrise Trek, Rain dance with an add-on sightseeing of Nandi Hills that can be done through your own vehicle.

gifts.desc: Set in the quiet boundless expanses outside of Bangalore, Ankit Vista Green Village is one of the premium resorts near to the silicon capital of India, Bangalore. Spread over a sprawling field, this resort has a broad mixed bag of expansive view with has all that much a dynamic blend of greenery. It is very well designed resort in Bangalore and has a rich green scene and brags of outstandingly tasteful building outline.The ethereal including makes a retreat circumstance that expands the visitor's rebuilding over weekends by lightening their mind, body and soul. An empowering escape close Bangalore, a day out at Ankit Vista Green Village makes a perfect outing destination for both corporate teams and family trips over weekends offering a  quiet respite amidst diversion and outside exercises nearby lavish settlement. Embark on a day out at Ankita Vista Green Village and let nature welcome you with its charms!

gifts.name: Coorg Coffee Plantation Tour
gifts.desc: Coorg coffee plantation tour provides you an opportunity to witness complete journey of coffee- right from the seed till the packed powder ready to adorn your mugs. Experience staying in these lush-green coffee estates, where even the air seems to carry the coffee aroma. Indulge in gaining an in-depth knowledge of coffee cultivation with this amazing coffee plantation tour in Madenadu Village in Coorg. The tour will start around 10:00 AM and it extends up to 3 hours. Interact with the locals who are well versed in all techniques used in coffee plantation. Learn more about pruning techniques, picking, drying and other important information. Take a walk through these sprawling coffee estates, learn about other popular plantations of the region as well such as pepper, cardamom, wild fruits during your Coorg coffee plantation tour. Well, there is no better way to end this amazing Coorg coffee plantation tour than drinking coffee in the back yard of coffee estates.

gifts.name: Tadiandamol Trek 2019, Coorg
gifts.desc: The scenic Western Ghats offer exciting adventures for thrill seekers who want to explore the wild side. About 274 km from Bangalore, the Tadiandamol Peak is the highest peak in Coorg and is surrounded by stunning greenery of the Shola forests. Reaching an elevation of 1,748m, Tadiandamol trekking in Coorg is a perfect trek for both domestic and international travellers. A 2-day getaway is ideal for nature loving families, couples, backpackers and corporate guests. The 15 km trek to Tadiandamol is nothing short of exciting activity. Enjoy unravelling the winsome and landscape of Coorg that lures several travellers. Once on top, feel the pride as you conquer the highest peak of the destination. This feat is rewarded with sweeping views of green forests and coffee plantations. The Tadiandamol Trek package includes food, accommodation in tents or dormitory and transportation from Bangalore to Bangalore, and guides.
